description: ★★Winner of the 2011 Best App Ever Awards - Casual Game ONCE YOU SLICE, YOU CAN'T STOP SLICING! Silver AWARD Winner - Pocket Gamer ★★★This game supports English, Deutsch, français, Español, Italiano, and 日本語★★★ Fast Fun with a Geometric Flair! "Slice It!" is all about slicing shapes into fragments that are equal in size. Sound easy? It may start out that way, but soon you'll be cutting into fragments that will puzzle you like never before. Brainteasing puzzles: over 200 Basic Stages and a five-star rating system so you can play until you get it right! ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ New time attack mode, “Slice it! QUICK!” Try to slice as many, as accurate, and as fast as you can in 1 minute! Also, compete with friends to get higher rankings. ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ 200 STAGES… and growing! Each level is a new shape, and each stage has increasingly difficult fragmentation levels. In the most advanced stages, new obstacles, like line-refracting mirrors, make Slice It! the hardest puzzler out there. Get a perfect score on any level and earn a Hint! If you just can't cut it with an obstacle, all is not lost: use a Hint! You can get additional Hints, when you tap AD. It’s time to start thinking and slicing! ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ WHAT THE PRESS SAYS ABOUT SLICE IT! "...if you're looking for a new type of puzzle game with a charming style that's easy to pick up and play, take a look at Slice It!" - TouchArcade.com "It may look like a toy, but you’d have to be a genius not to get stuck at some point while playing this clever, challenging game." - PocketGamer.co.uk "Simple in its shape, Slice It brings us along this game which is unpretentious but terribly addictive." - Hitphone.fr
release_text: Once you slice, you can’t stop slicing! Slice It now supports the Lollipop update! Have feedback? Leave a review or drop us a line at info@com2us.com

description: Contacts, Calendar, Tasks, Memos, Journals, Categories, and Notes in one App, all synchronized to your PC and Mac. Amazing time-saving features like Templates, Location Picker, Voice Commands, and Encrypted database. Help forums available. Synchronize to Outlook using secure USB, secure Wi-Fi, or secure DejaCloud. Uses CompanionLink (sold separately) to sync to Outlook on Mac, Outlook on PC, Lotus Notes, Act!, Palm Desktop and other CRM software. Android app is free. CompanionLink PC and Mac sync software sold separately starting at $14.95. Free telephone support and money-back guarantee. CompanionLink (PC): http://www.companionlink.com/android CompanionLink (Mac): http://www.companionlink.com/mac Voice Commands cheatsheet: http://www.companionlink.com/support/kb/DejaOffice_Voice_Commands (Video) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xw6MAv15yjU (Video) Android Sync DejaCloud http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aezkP1ziVcQ (Video) Android Sync USB: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b-6Br1Cy68k DejaOffice is the only Outlook sync solution that gives you: • Contacts, Calendar, Tasks, Notes and Journal in one business-class app • Option to choose Cloud or USB Connect for sync • Built to mirror Outlook data fields and look-n-feel• One-click option to keep personal and business data separate • Full database encryption on Android • Free phone support for life Choose from USB Connect or Cloud to sync Outlook with Android. Works with standalone Microsoft Outlook (no Exchange required, though we also support Exchange public folders). DejaOffice synchronizes with popular CRM and PIM software like Microsoft Outlook, Lotus Notes, Sage ACT!, Palm Desktop, Salesforce CRM, Zoho CRM, SugarCRM, GroupWise, GoldMine, Highrise, and Time and Chaos. What people say about DejaOffice: “First Outlook sync product that worked correctly out of the box.” (Reuben G) “After 15 days of fussing with other products, I’ve come home to CompanionLink.” (Herb D) “Best app I’ve ever downloaded. Professional, easy to use, intuitive.” (Eddie S) DejaOffice is mentioned on CNBC, AndroidCentral, AndroidForums, DroidForums, SkyMall and many other places! ==================== Features ==================== Smartphones aren’t very smart when it comes to business functionality. DejaOffice changes that by adding business features similar to BlackBerry and Palm Treo. From color-coded categories, linking contacts to appointments and tasks, advanced view, sort and search options, DejaOffice gives you business features not found in Android devices. • Holds more than 50,000 records • Built to mirror Outlook contacts, Outlook calendar, Outlook tasks, and Outlook notes • Advanced contacts sort (first name, last name, company name, categories) • Category manager with colors • 5 calendar views (day, week, month, year, list) • Multiple task styles (GTD, Franklin Covey, TBYL, Outlook-style, Palm-style) • Daily agenda widget (your appointments and tasks in one view) • Calendar and task alarms • Set advanced calendar recurrence patterns • Link contacts to calendar events • Group contacts by city, company, postal code • Private records (password-protected) • Custom fields • Contact photos • Global search across all CRM data • Full database encryption • History log for every contact record+ Selectable font sizes • Guided wizard for quick setup • Set Android home screen shortcuts to individual DejaOffice apps • Dual-pane viewing options for Android Tablets. Better productivity and optimal use of screen space. • Integrates with built-in Android Contacts, Calendar, Dialer, Maps, Email, SMS, Browser • Language options: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Chinese (China) and Chinese (Taiwan). • Works with all Android devices including Galaxy series, DROID series, HTC, LG, Huawei, Sony and others
release_text: Updates in version 3.2.9: -Fixed task Move To Today option to automatically sync to DejaCloud if enabled -DejaTask group Due Date now sorts by Subject then Priority, instead of just Subject -Custom field labels for DejaContacts now only change in a sync if they are still the default values -Deleting a multiday all day event now deletes properly -Fixed font size on DejaContact view screen for phone numbers -Fixed some phone numbers not being clickable in the note field

Golf Pad is an advanced golf GPS rangefinder, scorecard and shot tracker . Use it standalone or with Golf Tags - the new real-time golf gps shot tracking system. * Easy and intuitive - it just works * Optimized to save battery life * Available on 30,000+ golf courses around the world , more added daily * Start playing in seconds - no registration required * Now with Anrdoid Wear , Samsung Gear , Pebble and Magellan Echo Series smartwatch support Want to know every shot's distance without pulling phone from your pocket? New! Featured at the PGA Merchandise Show 2015, Golf Tags enable golfers to easily quantify and improve their performance. The system is available for only $99 and includes a set of 15 tags that attach to the back of each club. Tags work with the Golf Pad app to seamlessly capture the game in full detail. Get your set at http://www.GolfPadGPS.com/tags . Just need a great golf gps rangefinder and scoring app? Download Golf Pad, it works with or without Golf Tags. This is not a trial, not a demo , but truly a fully-functional golf gps range finder app. Play as many courses as often as you like, anywhere in the world. It's FREE and will be free forever. Many features that cost money in competitor golf gps apps are included for free in Golf Pad GPS. Like instant distance to front/middle/back of the green, detailed scoring for up to 4 golfers, aerial maps with flyovers, tee-to-green shot & club tracking, and more. Get extended statistics, smartwatch link and handicap scoring with Golf Pad Premium upgrade. Free features: * Free golf GPS rangefinder. Instant distance to middle/front/back of the green, or any point on course * Free PGA-quality scorecard for 1-4 golfers . Track strokes, putts, penalties, sand and fairways for every player * One-tap shot tracker . Easily record positions and clubs, measure length of your shots. Use it for drives or every shot on a hole. See shots on the map. All for free! Learn more: http://www.golfpadgps.com/shot-tracker.html * Free aerial map . Tap to measure golf gps distance to bunkers, water or any other point on golf course * Keep full playing history. Review and edit scorecards for past golf rounds at any time * Take notes as you play. Review or edit notes for past rounds at any time * Track your progress with rich statistics , including scoring, putts, accuracy, penalties, fairways, sand, G.I.R. and distance walked * Share rounds via Facebook or email . Your friends will see the scorecard, notes and shots on the map, including clubs and length * Use 'uncharted mode' to keep score on any course, including mini golf and disc golf * GPS rangefinder supports meters and yards NO registration. NO course download fees. NO LIMITS. We are constantly working on adding more features and making Golf Pad GPS better and easier to use. If you have a feature request, a question or need help, take a look at www.golfpadgps.com/support.html or email support@contorra.com . We’ll be happy to help! Missing your favorite golf course? We have over 30,000 courses around the world. In an unlikely event yours is missing, you can map it yourself in few minutes on your own computer: http://scout.golfpadgps.com . If you noticed a problem with existing course, please contact us at support@contorra.com . Join hundreds of thousands of golfers who chose GolfPad GPS range finder & scorecard over SkyDroid, Free Caddie, GolfShot, Swing by Swing, SkyCaddie, GolfLogix, GolfNow and other golf gps navigator apps. Learn more at http://www.golfpadgps.com . Here’s what our users have to say: ★★★★★ Simply the best I've tried so many other apps and GPS gadgets for golf along side golf pad and this remains top pick for me, friendly on battery and accurate and all recent update functions make this app an utter joy to use. 10stars from me.
release_text: Version 10.9: course-specific statistics! - View the average and best score for every course - Scoring statistics for each hole - Driving club accuracy and outcome analysis - Approach analysis - Short game and putting statistics - Driving and approach maps Version 10.0: Introducing Golf Tags - the new golf tracking system. Featured at the PGA Merchandise Show, Golf Tags enables golfers to easily analyze and improve their performance. Get your set at www.GolfPadGPS.com/tags for only $99.

Three years have passed since you valiantly tried to defend the Earth from the asteroid bombardment. You tried your best, but the shields failed and your beloved planet was destroyed. Now you're trying to race away from the destruction through wave after wave of meteoric menace, only this time you're carrying heavy weaponry, and that might just come in handy when you find out who - or what - was responsible for the destruction.. * Retro arcade shooting action with big chunky explodey pixels! * Destroy asteroids and collect BITS to upgrade your ship * Random boss encounters! * Challenge your friends on the leaderboards * Did I mention the explosions?
release_text: Thanks for playing! I've tweaked some knobs and fiddled with sliders to give you a new update. Changes are as follows.. - Removed banner ads - Removed ability to continue by watching a video - Added ability to earn BITZ by watching a video in the Shop - I love you. But that's not a change. As always, a rating and/or review every time a new update is released greatly helps me improve things for you guys. Thank you again for your support!

★ Great fun guaranteed - can you find all the differences? ★ With 3 levels of difficulties for each scene, there is a challenge for everyone! A fun and addictive app for the whole family! In two levels, the clock is ticking - find all differences and avoid mistakes: each mistake will cost you time against the clock. Animal Spot the Difference Features - Beautiful high-quality images (theme: farm and nature) - Addictive gameplay - Catchy sound effects and music! - Differences randomized on each play - 3 different difficulty levels (timer countdown in 2 of them) - Fun brain and memory training - educational game for kids, toddlers and their parents Visual comparison: - comparing two or more things by eye.  - first stage in a child's development of an understanding of geometry and measurement You will meet cows, frogs, ducks, turtles, chicks, sheeps, cocks, hens and other animals that live on the farm. The perfect Animal Spot the Difference app for those who love Spot the Difference games, Find the Difference puzzles, hide and seek and photo hunt apps! It's also perfect for everyone who loves the farm! The first 4 Find the Difference scenes are free, the remaining 8 Spot the Difference can be easily purchased via a single in-app purchase. We really appreciate your feedback - If you enjoy playing our app, please take a minute to rate and review it. Please consider that we cannot reply to your comments in the Appstore. If you have any questions or need our help, please use the given support link. Thank you!

Merry Christmas! Four different christmas themes are just waiting to be discovered. The difficulty level can be adjusted individually – there is something for every kid. Colourful graphics, kid-friendly sounds and effects top-off the play experience. Christmas Jigsaw Puzzles Features: • In total 20 puzzles, cute graphics and light and cheerful music. • Easy to use interface specifically designed for young children • A hint on/off feature to provide optional assistance. • Problem Solving, logical and cognitive skills • excels concentration and memory skills Four different difficulty levels, ranging from 4-piece puzzles to 25-piece puzzles. A fun pop-the-balloons mini-game at the end of the game tops off the play experience! What will your kid be learning? Puzzles • build hand eye coordination • develop fine motor skills • offer opportunities for social and language skills • encourage problem solving and logical thinking • encourage problem solving and logical thinking 5 puzzles christmas are free, more games can be easily purchased in-game. We really appreciate your feedback - If you enjoy playing our app, please take a minute to rate and review it. If you have any questions or need our help, please send us an e-mail to support+android@coragames.com or contact us by using the given support link. Thank you! We wish you a merry Christmas!

Dr. Trivia is the incredible game of questions and answers, now in English, Spanish and Catalan! Including questions with images! Test your knowledge, challenge your friends and pass exams of Dr. Trivia! Will you be able to answer more than 1000 questions from Dr. Trivia? Do you consider yourself an expert in geography? Do you know the flags of the world? You know everything there is to know about movies? Are you a science expert? Do you know more history that Marty McFly? Now you can prove it! Dr. Trivia is a game of questions and answers with 6 exciting categories: Geography, Movies and Television, History, Art, Science and Kids. You can combine the categories as you wish! Choose one, two, three ... or all of them! And this is just the beginning. The game will be expanded with the questions you suggest to us! To win, you must answer the questions and get maximum points in any of the 5 game modes: * Time Trial: Answer as many questions as you can in a limited time ... Dr. Trivia will reward with extra time for every right answer! * No Time: Simply answer as many questions as you want. Take it easy, you have all the time in the world! * 10 Questions: Answer 10 questions. Do you dare? * 20 Questions: Answer 20 questions. Show what you know! * No error: Answer as many questions as you can... but no errors are allowed! The ultimate challenge! If you repeatedly win, Dr. Trivia will reward you with a Bonus Star and ... you can use the stars to answer questions you do not know! Do you think the game is too easy? Or do you still need some practice? No problem! Dr. Trivia features 100 difficulty levels. Move the bar and tune the difficulty! Can you master level 100? The game comes in two versions: * Dr. Trivia? Free: All features and 500 questions that will test your skills. You can receive up to three stars. * Dr. Trivia?: All features and 1000 questions to test your knowledge. You can receive up to 6 stars, and includes the category "Kids", specially designed for children to play!. If you do not like ads, this version has no ads. Visit us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/corbomiteapps See our Apps: http://play.google.com/store/search?q=Corbomite+Productions Send us an email or suggest questions: corbomiteproductions@gmail.com If you spot an error, do not hesitate and send us an email. And if you like Dr. Trivia, rate it on Google Play!

Wolltest du immer schon mal Lokführer deines eigenen ICE sein und kreuz und quer durch Deutschland fahren? Dann ist das kostenlose Spiel „der kleine ICE“ von der Deutschen Bahn genau das Richtige für dich! In „der kleine ICE“ wählst du zuerst deine Figur aus und kleidest und gestaltest sie so, wie du magst. Danach geht es auch schon los - du bekommst erklärt, wie du Schienen verlegst und deinen ICE fahren lässt. Zur Lösung spannender Aufgaben baust du nach und nach ein Schienennetz durch ganz Deutschland! In schicker 3D-Grafik überquerst du dabei Flüsse wie den Rhein oder die Donau und verbindest Bahnhöfe großer Städte wie Berlin, Hamburg, Frankfurt oder München. Für Spaß und Spannung sorgt auch die knifflige Suche nach versteckten Sternen. Für alles wirst du mit Punkten belohnt, so dass du und deine Figur immer weiter im Rang aufsteigen. Dadurch schaltest du tolle Sachen frei, wie neue Kleidung für deine Figur oder Antriebe für deinen Zug. Ja, richtig gelesen! Du kannst sogar das Aussehen deines ICE verändern. Wie wäre es mit einem Raketenantrieb oder einer Zebrabemalung für deinen kleinen ICE? Spiele von überall! Dein Spielfortschritt wird online gespeichert. Das Tolle dabei ist, dass du jederzeit und überall dein Abenteuer fortsetzen kannst, sei es nun auf dem iPad, dem iPhone, dem Computer zu Hause, oder anderen mobilen Endgeräten. Dies setzt allerdings eine Registrierung voraus. Features: * Kostenloses, offizielles Spiel der Deutschen Bahn * Baue Bahnstrecken durch ganz Deutschland * Verbinde die größten Bahnhöfe von Hamburg bis München * Kreiere deine eigene Figur und kleide sie ein * Gestalte deinen ICE und lasse ihn quer durchs Land fahren * Erledige spannende Aufgaben wie die Beförderung von Passagieren * Fahre vorbei an Sehenswürdigkeiten wie dem Brandenburger Tor oder überquere Flüsse wie den Rhein * Tolle, bunte 3D-Comicgrafik * Leichter Einstieg durch kindgerechte Erklärungen und einer intuitiven Steuerung * Spiele abwechselnd auf Android-Geräten, iOS-Geräten oder PC/Mac mit deinem Spielstand weiter Did you always wanted to be your own ICE train driver and criss-cross drive through Germany? Then the free game "the little ICE" by Deutsche Bahn is just the thing for you! In "the little ICE" you select your character from first and to dress and gestaltest them as you like. Then it's also going on - you get explains how you can run your verlegst rails and ICE. To solve exciting challenges you build gradually a rail network throughout Germany! In fancier 3D graphics while you cross rivers such as the Rhine or the Danube and connect stations of large cities like Berlin, Hamburg, Frankfurt and Munich. For fun and excitement, the tricky provides search for hidden stars. For everything you will be rewarded with points, so that you and your character continues to rise in rank. Thus you unlock great things, like new clothes for your character or drives for your train. Yes, you read that right! You can even change the appearance of your ICE. How about a rocket engine or a zebra paint for your little ICE? Games from anywhere! Your game progress is stored online. The great thing about this is that you can continue your adventure at any time and anywhere, be it on the iPad, the iPhone, home computer or other mobile devices. However, this requires registration. Features: * Free, official game of the Deutsche Bahn * Build rail lines throughout Germany * Connect the biggest stations from Hamburg to Munich * Create your own character and dress them * Personalize let him drive through the country and across your ICE * Kill exciting tasks such as transport of passengers * Drive past landmarks such as the Brandenburg Gate or cross over rivers like the Rhine * Beautiful and colorful 3D cartoon graphics * Easy access through child-friendly explanations and intuitive control * Games alternately continue on Android devices, iOS devices, or PC / Mac with your score
release_text: * Weitere Fehlerbehebungen und Verbesserungen * Im Tutorial wird nun das Wenden und das Löschen von Schienen erklärt. * Sammel täglich neu platzierte Sterne auf, um aufzusteigen!

description: Free yourself from your studio with Painter Mobile for Android. Experience this incredible new art app on your Android device. Sketch and paint on the go and then import your work directly into Painter to add the professional finishing touches. Now you can take your art to the streets and find new inspiration anytime, anywhere with Painter Mobile. • Access familiar tools, including: Paint, Eyedropper, Paint Bucket, Eraser and Crop • Transform your work, with the ability to Scale, Rotate, Flip, Skew, Apply Perspective or Distort • Take advantage of Horizontal, Vertical and Kaleidoscope symmetry • Work with up to 15* layers • Import photos from a gallery, camera or Google Images search • Save as JPEG and send documents to Corel Painter on the desktop (Upgrade to Full and also save to PNG or PSD) • Work quickly using two finger canvas rotation • Map functions to hardware keys or common gestures (long press and double-tap) • Use your finger to blend, navigate the canvas or select a color while you paint with your stylus • Use brush sets designed for artists • Work with a resolution of 1024 x 1024 or upgrade to Pro for 2048 x 2048 high definition* • Use real-world art tools, including: Pencils, Chalks, Charcoals, Pens, Markers, Calligraphy, Paintbrushes and Watercolors • Create unique effects with built-in Sprayers and Blenders • Choose from 16 brushes or upgrade to Full and get 70+ Natural-Media® brushes • Create and organize brush sets • Fine-tune control with a multitude of brush settings • Jitter nearly every attribute from brush size to brush color • Blend and mix colors naturally with the Blender Brushes • Experience life-like painting with pressure-sensitivity and stylus support • Work with a non-obtrusive interface for optimal drawing space • Optimized for the Wacom Cintiq Companion Hybrid and other stylus devices *Not available on some devices Thanks to Ivan McKinnon, Terri Cooper, Manuel Mendoza Reyes, Jeffrey Hebert, Emmanel Charon, Sathish B.R., Regina W, massimo, and Tiriasu for permitting us to use their amazing artwork.
release_text: -Fixed crashing on share in -Three finger gestures: tap to show / hide interface, slide up / down to change size -Save after 3-sec delay -Transform tool: tap to lock and unlock proportions -Fixed multiple crashing issues -Other minor bug fixes

Ultimate Dash with Friends is a platform game where you have a multitude of characters you can choose to dash. You can collect coins and diamonds in order to challenge and run in 21 different levels. You can share your scores and levels reached with your friends via google play services and facebook. Challenge your friends in Ultimate Dash with Friends to see who is the one that has the longest dash.

description: Crash landing on an uncharted planet for Zap has been a bad day. Help him out by gunning through all the waves of enemy bugs coming at him. Purchase bullets for the many different weapons to smash the insect invasion. Similar to asteroids you are placed in the middle of the area and tap all over the screen to shoot the bugs before they reach the center. This fast paced one touch input game will get your heart pumping and fingers tapping. Included is amazing in game artwork by the talented Paul Conway at DoomCube.com. • 21 Levels • 5 Different weapons • Unique enemy bugs • Great Art by Paul Conway • Ants, Beetles, Wasps, and more • New areas and upgrades coming soon. This game is still young many more levels, areas, purchases, and updates will be coming soon. Rate it and leave a comment. Send us an e-mail with requests, ideas, or issues.
release_text: v1.1.3 Fixed some minor issues Minor fix on Ad v1.1 Touch enemies on title screen Added animations to purchases Added animations and effects to wave won screen Opening gun menu pauses game Added location decorations Added ads v1.0 Bug Zap launched!

description: In CotBot City you can explore the city on a virtual car play mat. You can select buildings for the city yourself, and then you get to pick a vehicle of your choice - fire truck, ice cream truck, garbage truck, school bus or an ordinary car. There are several mini games and fun events to explore as you drive along, all depending on which vehicle you are driving. Sell ice-cream with the ice-cream van, drive to the city dump with the garbage truck and put the garbage in the right can, or extinguish fires with the fire truck! There are no failures - only fun! Gameplay is infinite, you cannot win, you cannot lose, but you are free to explore the city for as long as you choose. There are no in-app purchases or advertisements inside the app, and it is safe for small children to enjoy. The game is mainly aimed at 3-6 year old children, but can be entertaining for older and younger gamers alike! It contains advanced 3D graphics, designed to run well on lower end devices. The game was produced and developed in Sweden by parents of three year old twins. www.facebook.com/cotbotgames - 8 different buildings to choose from when populating the city - 6 different vehicles that can be driven around the city - 5 mini-games inside the game, and lots of fun features to discover - Original 3D graphics - Fun sounds and animations - Easy to use child-friendly interface - Infinite game play, no rules or points - Produced by parents of small children - Made in Sweden - No third-party advertising - No in-app purchases "Cotbot City is a fun and pedagogical digital play mat that will help toddlers and young children to learn how to navigate the world in an engaging game-like setting." Ph.D Marita Ljungqvist, Educational Developer at Lund University
release_text: It's Christmas in CotBot City! Santa's sleigh! Snow

description: No1.핫딜쇼핑 모음 쏘핫! 지금까지 이런 핫딜 모음 앱은 없었다! 포인트모아 티몬, 쿠팡, 위메프에서 사용 가능한 5000 포인트 받으세요! 카카오 친구 초대하고 포인트 받고 소셜커머스 앱다운받고 포인트 받고! 리뷰쓰고 포인트 받고! 쏘핫 앱 설치 후 아래 방법으로 포인트를 받을 수 있습니다. ◆ 카카오 친구 초대시 300포인트 ◆ 소셜커머스 앱 설치시 500포인트 (기존 앱 설치자 제외) ◆ 쏘핫 리뷰 작성시 200~500포인트 (리뷰 작성시 아이디 입력) ■■ 소셜커머스 핫딜 모음 쏘핫 (소셜핫딜) ■■ 티몬, 위메프, 오클락, 쇼킹딜,지마켓, G9, 다원데이 ■■ 소셜커머스 모음 앱을 받아야 하는 이유? ■■ 1. 매일매일 티몬, 위메프,오클락, 오픈마켓,카카오픽 등 마다 각기 다른 핫딜이 쏟아 집니다. 2. 같은 상품도 판매 기간과 일정이 각기 다릅니다. 3. 같은 상품이 매진 될 수도 더 쌀 수도 있습니다. 그래서 한번에 비교 하는 것이 가장 좋습니다. ■■ 이런분에게 추천합니다 ■■ 1. 우리 동네 할인 맛집, 미용실, 마사지숍, 공연, 키즈카페 등 궁금하신분! 2. 온라인 최저가 상품을 구매 하고자 하시는 분 3. 오늘 구매 하고 내일 배송 받고 싶으신분. 4. 더욱 싸고 알차게 해외여행 국내여행 펜션등을 찾고 싶으신분! 5. 같은 제품이라도 더욱 큰 행복과 만족을 느끼고 싶으신 분 모두! 소셜커머스 쇼핑의 시작! 국내최초! 최대 소셜커머스 모음 1위 쏘핫에서 반값 할인 쿠폰과 상품을 만나보세요. 2000만 이용자가 사용하는 소셜커머스 쇼핑은 "쏘핫"에서 쉽게 검색 할 수 있습니다. 쏘핫은 소샬커머스 상품의 인기순위를 공정하게 제공 하며 내 주변 가까운 반갑 쿠폰을 찾아 드립니다. ◆ 티몬, 쿠팡, 위메프를 한번에 볼 수 있다니.. 요건 몰랐네! - @놀라워라! ◆ 9700원 이상 구매시 무료배송! 이거 완전 대박! 신세계군요! - @무료배송해주세요. ◆ 티몬 같은데 아니고 위메프 같은데 아니네요. 이게 융합이줘? - @FuSION ◆ 상품 검색이 소셜보다도 훨씬 쉽고편리하네요. - @easy_peasy ◆ 친구 폰에도 마구마구 깔고 있어요! 느낌아니깐 - @install ◆ 쿠차,쿠폰모아 보다도 쏘핫이 좋아요~! - @sure [보도자료] ⊙ 쿠팡•티몬•위메프 소셜커머스 올해 목표는 '손님 모시기' 경쟁 - 미디어잇 2014.01.31 ⊙ 쿠팡•티몬•위메프 등 [소셜커머스] 급성장한 이유? - 뉴델일리 2014.01.07 ⊙ 쏟아지는 소셜커머스, 더 깎으면 공짭니다 - 아시아경제 2014.05.15 ⊙ 황금연휴 나들이, 소셜커머스 이용하면 더싸다 - 아시아경제 2014.05.02 ⊙ 지갑 얇아 걱정이라면… 소셜커머스•여행패키지 상품 두드려라 - 대전일보 2013.12.26 ======================================= [쏘핫(소셜핫딜) 특징 및 요약] 1. 티몬,쿠팡,위메프에서 사용 가능한 5000포인트 받으세요. (완전 대박 입니다!) 2. 소셜커머스 2000만 이용자가 쓰는 필수어플! 3. 티몬, 위메프, CJ오클락 반값 상품 한번에 모아보기! (참! 편리 합니다.) 4. 티몬, 위메프, 쿠팡 보다도 상세한 4뎁스 상세 카테고리 검색! - 지마켓과 동일한 완전 상세한 상품 검색! 5. 500만 소셜커머스 매니아가 찾는 최초 소셜커머스모음 서비스 6. 스마트한 내 주변 지역 쿠폰 검색! - 50m, 100m 등 내 위치정보를 통한 초 근거리 쿠폰을 한번의 클릭으로 찾을 수 있습니다. 7. 실시간 핫딜 검색 8. 혼자 보기 아까운 반값 HOT 딜 정보 카카오 친구들에게 공유 하기! 9 모바일 구매 - 아직도 PC로만 쿠폰을 구매하시나요? 스마트폰을 통해서 편리하게 쿠폰을 구매하실 수 있습니다. 10. PC에서도 이용 하세요. http://www.daoneday.com ======================================= 1. 소셜커머스 쇼핑 - 쏘핫에서는 매일 매일 반값 또는 파격가로 상품을 구매할수 있습니다. - 인기 남성 쇼핑몰, 여성의류 쇼핑몰의 할인권은 물론 봄 피크닉, 캠핑용품, 스포츠, 브랜드패션 등 트랜드 쇼핑을 쉽고 편하게 할 수 있습니다. - 신상 구두, 신상 백, 신상 원피스 등 각종 신상 아이템과 QR인증으로 해외 브랜드까지 할인된 가격으로 구매할 수 있습니다. - 세련된 맘들을 위한 아기 기저귀, 분유, 아기띠, 아동복 등 위메프에서 유아 용품을 세일된 가격으로 만나볼 수 있습니다. - 컵, 타월, 프라이팬, 욕조, 침대까지! 다양한 생활 용품을 저렴한 가격으로 이용할 수 있습니다. - 운동할 시간이 부족한 당신에게 추천하는 홈트레이닝! 멀티 전신 운동기기,유산소 운동기기등 최신운동 쇼핑 아이템들이 가득합니다. - 값비싼 다이어트는 이제그만! 디톡스 다이어트, 레몬 다이어트, 황제다이어트, 원푸드 다이어트등 다이어트 준비의 시작 할수있습니다. 2. 소셜커머스 여행 / 문화 - 소셜커머스 국내여행, 해외여행, 제주여행, 항공권 상품을 저렴하게 쇼핑할 수 있습니다. - 기차, 지하철 등 각종 교통 수단을 이용한 나만의 여행 상품을 이용할 수 있습니다. - 여행 상품을 비롯한 공연, 뮤지컬, 영화, 연극 티켓을 소셜커머스의 할인된 가격으로 만나볼 수 있습니다. - 테마파크 할인 쿠폰을 구매할 수 있습니다. 3. 소셜커머스 맛집 / 뷰티 - 서울 맛집, 인천 맛집, 대구 맛집, 부산 맛집 등 다양한 전국 맛집을 저렴하게 이용할 수 있습니다. - 여행 계획의 필수 코스 맛집 탐방! 위메프 지역 맛집 쿠폰, 카페 쿠폰을 사용해 할인 된 가격으로 구매할 수 있습니다. - 어김없이 찾아오는 무더운 날씨, 노출의 계절 여름에 대비할 수 있는 비싼 피부 관리 뷰티 쇼핑을 저렴하게 이용할 수 있습니다. - 헤어, 미용, 뷰티, 마사지 등 비싼 에스테틱도 저렴하게 찾을 수 있습니다. 4. 매일 매일의 새로운 이벤트 - 다양한 기획전과 쿠폰 제공이벤트 등 쇼핑 1번지 위메프에서 최신 혜택 바로 확인가능합니다. - 비오는 날씨, 화창한 날씨, 무더운 날씨에도 위메프는 고객이 원하는 최상의 서비스를 제공합니다. - 무료배송, 무료반품, 무료체험의 특전기회를 위메프 쇼핑몰에서 경험할 수 있습니다.(일부 상품제외) - 신상 아이템들이 매주 업데이트 됩니다.
release_text: 쏘핫 트랜스포메이션! [v3.4.1 버전] 검색 기능 강화 푸시 기능 강화 모든지 다 강화중 [v3.4.0 버전] - 쏘핫이 더 쏘핫 해졌다! - 소셜커머스, 오픈마켓, 종합몰 핫딜 총 집합 - 어떤 쇼핑 앱 보다도 쉽고, 편리한 점만 골라 장착! - 일단 써 보면 압니다. 불편하면 삭제 해도 됩니다! (쏘핫 자신감) 써보면 또 쓰게 됩니다! *안정적인 앱 업데이트를 위해서는 가금적 실행중인 앱을 완전히 종료 혹은 삭제 하시고 업데이트 부탁 드립니다.

description: Grocery shopping made quick and easy with the features you expect from the #1 grocery shopping list app. Build lists from our extensive product database using text, barcode, or voice search; sync and share lists with other devices and the GroceryiQ.com website; find related coupons and much more! "Grocery iQ takes the old-fashioned grocery list to the 21st century" ∼ Forbes.com "Helps you when you're grocery shopping…sync up with your friends or your roommates or your family's list" ∼ The Today Show "We all want to save money, so why not use your iPhone? The king of coupons is Grocery iQ...If you regularly shop at a grocery store or other retailer, be sure to install their app" ∼ GiGaOM.com "If your shopping list is currently the back of an envelope that you’ve scribbled some items on (mom!), then it’s time for you to check out GroceryIQ." ∼ InteriordesignHQ.com Key Features: ✓ Lists: Build grocery lists quickly from our database of millions of items. ✓ Aisles: Create custom aisles and reorder aisles for any list. ✓ Favorites: Easily add frequently purchased items to new lists, search and filter favorites to build lists quickly. ✓ History: Keep track of what you've checked out and filter history by list. Easily create lists from history items. ✓ Multi-Barcode Scan: Add multiple items by simply pointing your camera at any product barcodes. ✓ Voice Search: Use advanced voice search to add items to your list. ✓ All List Items: Never forget an item again by viewing all items in "All List Items". Toggle your lists settings to view "All List Items" on any list you choose. ✓ Store Locator: Find nearby grocery stores and add your loyalty card. ✓ Sync: Sync your lists with the GroceryiQ.com website, friends and family. ✓ Coupons: Search free coupons, view recommended coupons, email or add coupons to your store loyalty card. ✓ Item Details: Add price and description, weight, quantity and more. Start simplifying your grocery shopping today! Having trouble with the app? We're here to help! Check out our FAQs: www.groceryiq.com/support_android.aspx
release_text: Stability improvements for Android 5.0 Lollipop and above. Happy shopping, - Team Grocery iQ

description: Brand New and Completely Free to download, the Coventry Telegraph app gives you all the very latest news, sport and entertainment from the heart of Coventry every day. The brand new Coventry Telegraph app combines the latest cutting edge technology with the best in local news, sport, entertainment and information for the whole of the Coventry area. Known around the world for our inside track on Coventry City and other local football teams, you need this app if you want to be kept in the know about your teams. And we're more than just words. You can check out our stunning picture galleries and on-the-scene videos and also set up the app to highlight the content you are interested in. It'll also be home to our daily news live blog – the place to go for instant news, information and traffic and travel. Free to download - Offline reading for all articles - 24/7 breaking news stories - Image galleries - Videos - Live coverage of big news and sports events - Coventry City FC coverage - Whats on listings and events
release_text: *Hidden text issue *Banners blocking content have been removed *Other bug fixes *Optimisations for Android 5.0

description: The COYBL app is a collaboration between Central Ohio Youth Baseball League and Sport Ngin. The site is a true destination for all schedules, scores, news, photos and more. Now you can access photos, videos, comments, stats and live scores on your Android device. - Follow your favorite http://www.coybl.org team within the app. - Keep up with the latest schedules, results, news and statistics. - Share photos and videos right from the game! - Enjoy rosters and player profiles, complete with game-by-game statistics. - Comment on events, articles, photos and videos. - Receive push notifications for game/event updates, news articles, videos and posts.

app_name: LINK - ありがとうの地域プラットフォーム
description: 4月から浜松市土木スマホ通報システム「いっちゃお！」がLINKからご利用いただけるようになりました。 道路の舗装、側溝及びカーブミラーなど、危険な箇所を発見した際に、スマートフォンから写真付きで浜松市へ通報することができます。 通報は浜松市の担当部署が迅速に対応します。 道路等で危険な箇所を見つけたらLINKを使って浜松市にいっちゃお！ http://linkz.jp/icchao.html 近くのお店情報や、イベント情報がすぐに見つかる！ お気に入りのブログを登録しておくことで見逃さずサクサク読めちゃう。 いま必要な地元の情報をすぐにキャッチ、共有できる無料アプリ、それがLINK（リンク）です。 http://linkz.jp/index.html ■ 「LINK」の機能 ・お気に入りのブログを購読することで、今まで見逃していた記事も、漏れなくチェックすることができます！ ・スマートフォンのGPS情報を使用し、今いる位置の周辺のブログをタイムラインで表示します。 自分の周りにある今まで知らなかったお得な情報を見つけることができます。 ・ブロガーさんのお店を地図に表示しています。お店の詳細情報やブログの新着も確認することができ、お店へのナビゲーションなども可能です。 ・「LINK」からブログ記事を閲覧すると、下部に「ありがとうボタン」が表示されています。「ありがとう」は閲覧者がブロガーさんに感謝の気持ちを伝える、「LINK」ならではのソーシャルボタンです。 ■現在利用可能ブログサイト ・はまぞう( http://www.hamazo.tv/ ) ・てぃーだブログ( http://blog.ti-da.net/ ) ・たまりば( http://tamaliver.jp/ ) ・オオサカジン( http://blog.osakazine.net/ ) ・京つう( http://www.kyo2.jp/ ) ・ナムジャイブログ( http://namjai.cc/ ) Hamamatsu civil Sumaho reporting system "Ciao gone!" From April is now available from the LINK. Road paving, such as gutters and curved mirror, when it was discovered dangerous place, you will be able to report to Hamamatsu City with photos from smartphone. Report is the department in charge of Hamamatsu City will respond quickly. Use the LINK If you find a dangerous place on the road, etc. Ciao went to Hamamatsu City! http://linkz.jp/icchao.html Nearby and shops information, event information is found soon! You may be able to read crispy and not overlooked by registering your favorite blog. Catch the local information you need now, the share can be free app, it is the LINK (link). http://linkz.jp/index.html ■ Function of "LINK" · Favorite it is possible to subscribe to blogs, articles that had been overlooked until now, or you can check not leak! • Use the GPS information of smartphone, you can view the blog in the vicinity of the position that are now in the time line. You can find the deals you did not know until now that is around him. · The shop blogger's I have displayed on the map. Shop more information or blog New also can be checked, such as navigation to shop is also available. • When you browse a blog post from "LINK", "Thank you button" has been displayed at the bottom. "Thank you" is viewers convey the gratitude to the blogger's, is a social button of unique "LINK". ■ currently available blog site · Hamazou ( http://www.hamazo.tv/ ) Teada blog ( http://blog.ti-da.net/ ) · Hangout ( http://tamaliver.jp/ ) Osaka Jin ( http://blog.osakazine.net/ ) · Kyoto through ( http://www.kyo2.jp/ ) Nam Jai blog ( http://namjai.cc/ )

app_name: デブ部腎臓くん@育成ゲーム無料ダイエットでマルチエンディング
description: 「デブ部腎臓くん(でぶとりじんぞうくん)」は、現役忍者なのにお酒とおつまみ、甘いもの、しょっぱいもの、脂っこいものが大好きでメタボ体系かつ腎臓を悪くしてしまった主人公「デブ部腎臓くん(通称)」に修行をさせてダイエットさせていく育成げーむアプリです。 -------------------------------------------------- デブ部腎臓くん(デブトリジンゾウクン)がどんな変化を遂げるのか!! -------------------------------------------------- 最後の選択によって、デブ部腎臓くんの将来が決まります。 ラストはあなたの選択により変化するマルチエンディングを採用。 全てのエンディングを達成すると、隠しエンディングが!! -------------------------------------------------- 腎臓くんのダイエット履歴は図鑑で再確認!! -------------------------------------------------- 腎臓くんが少しずつ(あるいは急激に!!)スリムになっていく様子を メニュ>図鑑から何度でも確認出来ます。 ダイエットの参考にはまったくならないかもしれませんが、きっと勇気づけられますよ!! -------------------------------------------------- その他、ボーナスステージやアイテムなど!! -------------------------------------------------- ゲーム中、一気にEXP(経験値)を獲得できるボーナスステージが発生します。 アイテムを購入したり、ツイッター、フェイスブック、ラインなどで是非お友達と一緒にお楽しみください!! 特にボーナスステージはアツクなる面白さと爽快感がありますので是非お楽しみくださいね。 -------------------------------------------------- ◇◆◇◆◇◆ 【おなかまゲーム】 ○●最高に可愛い乙女ワールド●○ 姫と魔女と魔法のケーキ-恋する女神のフォーチュンレシピ- ○●初代にして絶対的存在●○ くまたろクライシス～彼の犯した罪と罰～ ○●絵本の様な世界で起きるミステリー●○ 完全変態－歪んだ愛の犠牲者－ ○●平凡な日々を変えた突然の来訪者●○ しにがみ★～三途川のエスコート～ ○●元カレの身に起きた奇怪な事件●○ 彼は吸血鬼 ○●実家にやってきた天使すぎる彼氏＆悪魔すぎる彼氏●○ 君に寄り添う天使と悪魔 ○●天使すぎる彼女●○ 年齢=彼女居ない歴の青年に舞い降りた奇跡 ○●癒し系現役忍者のダイエット絵巻●○ デブ部腎臓くん ○●絶食しないダイオウグソクムシ●○ グソくんの野望〜とある甲殻類の観察日記〜 ○●"彼"の人生と記憶に迫る話題作●○ ゾビンソンクルイソー ○●ハロウィンの絶対的定番アプリ●○ Halloween night Magic-はじめてのドレスアップパーティ- ○●話題騒然まさかのアプリ可●○ ありのままで -巣アナと蟻の女王 ○●LINEスタンプで大人気●○ ゲコ原くんザ・アプリ ○●おちこぼれ妖狐の奮闘記●○ 妖怪白書～こぎつね成長記 無料育成ゲーム～ ○●残されたロボットの決断は…●○ ROGO ○●オッサンだって頑張っている。●○ 戦闘員はじめました～43歳起死回生物語～ ○●出会うと一番ガッカリする珍獣○● 僕、ハダカデバネズミです。 ○●これはもはや、日本の新文化●○ 壁ドン～好きっていうまで離さねぇ～ ◇◆◇◆◇◆

This is a 3D style virtual corn maze. The goal of the game is to find the pumpkin in each maze to unlock the next maze. There are 20 maze puzzles to get lost in and see how fast you can solve them. There is a trail of popcorn where the player has been to help avoid going into the same place twice.

This is a classic defender type game but with jellyfish. The goal of the game is to shoot as many of the Jellyfish as you can to unlock the next level and get a high score. You can post your scores to a Facebook leaderboard to share and compete with your friends for high score. Shooting 7 jellyfish in a row without missing releases a bonus starfish that you can shoot for bonus points. + Facebook Leaderboard + Easy to use controls + 40 levels + Sharp shooter bonus

Crazy Taxi Chase Racing Crazy Taxi Chase Racing is a simple but funny driving game. Your mission is to drive a taxi using the maximum possible speed. Just tilt your device to steer your Taxi away from other vehicles. Crazy Taxi Chase Racing is the best racing game ever!!! Is so addictive!! Free Download Crazy Taxi Chase Racing for unlimited time!

How long can you survive on the road full of zombies? "Crazy Road and Zombie" is a driving survival game wherein you need to run as long as you can on the road full of zombies with your truck. Drive your truck to steer away from obstacles. Smash zombies to kill them and collect coins. You can buy upgrades between levels if you have earned enough coins to purchase. There will be solid materials that obstruct the way; don’t hit them or the wall so as to maintain the trucks functionality. Fully damaged vehicle can end the game immediately. Game features: Upgrade your truck with multiple power-ups! Realistic physics and intuitive game control! Endless mode! Free without any In-App Purchases!

An addictive flying adventure with endless game play and crazy characters! Tap the cat and watch out for giant mad cakes! WARNING: PREPARE TO BE ADDICTED! Your life is about to be taken over by this hungry cat! Tap the cat to help him fly and eat as many strawberries as possible. Watch out for birds and mad cakes. You can even catch bubbles along the way for special flying powers! Show off your highest scores on Facebook! Ready, set, go get addicted! Interact with shapes, colors and triggers, prevent collisions and smash time bubbles to save trapped stars. Go back in time and change paths to solve puzzles. Primitives requires focus, creativity, balance and timing. Each level brings unique designs, new obstacles, doodling fun, and mind-bending challenges. ePlague lets you create your own E-fectious disease which will spread when you come into close contact to others who have the app. Those who become E-fected then E-fect others and the epidemic begins. World Alert! ePlague devastation has begun! E-fectious diseases are spreading throughout the world. It's ability to propagate is simply by vicinity. • Create a Disease. Watch it become an ePlague. • Prevent other Diseases. your goal is prevent eFections by others. • Web Site contains Disease maps showing where the eFections are. • All GPS based. Come in the area of another ePlague node, and you get eFected with their diseases. They also get your diseases.
Google Plus Photos lets you view and search for photos posted on Google Plus Photos / Picasa.

Shelly is an super intelligent digital personality that uses a natural language user interface to answer questions, make recommendations about life and love, and turn on you at any moment. Insult her, and she will lash out at you with vengeance! Anger her, and she will tear your heart out! Try to ignore her, and she will cut off your man parts! Here is a tip: Don't mention Siri. Cool snowboarding game for those who enjoy speed, adrenaline and the thrill of online races! Any fan of free runner games will love the multiplayer races of Snowboard Run. REAL ONLINE PLAYERS Challenge 3 players simultaneously as you race downhill. Move fast, collect power-ups and perform tricks to score maximum points and dominate the opposition. AWESOME TRICKS Jump off ramps and perform tricks to please the crowd. Combine jumps with rail slides, slaloms and even paragliding! Fast reflexes and smooth movement make a champion! ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY Whether you like winter sports or not, you will love showing your skills in fast races against friends and online rivals. Customize your board and rider for extra points! Google Play Game Services supported!

description: Labaik Ya Hussain! We present you wonderful Arbaeen live Wallpaper in honor to Hussein bin Ali who died in the Battle of Karbala and made Islam religion stronger. This Arbaeen live Wallpaper has Arba'een sign moving in front of the Husayn Mosque in Karbala with the stars glowing in the sky. =================================================== How to install: Home -> Press Menu -> Select Wallpapers -> Select Live Wallpapers -> Select Arba'een live Live Wallpaper from the list =================================================== Arba'een (Arabic: الأربعين‎, "forty") is one of the largest pilgrimage gatherings on Earth, in which over 10 million people go to the city ofKarbala in Iraq. As it is known by Persian-speaking and Urdu-speaking Muslimsin Central and South Asia, Arba'een is a Shia Muslim religious observation that occurs 40days after the Day of Ashura, it is observed all over the world. It commemorates themartyrdom of Hussein bin Ali, the grandson of the Prophet Muhammad which falls on the 20th day of the month of Safar. Husayn and 71 supporters died in the Battle of Karbala in the year 61 AH (680 CE), killed by Yazid I's army. Chehelom is also observed 40 days after the death of a family member or loved one. Forty days is the usual length of the time of mourning in many Islamic cultures. For more Islamic Live Wallpapers and apps, please visit my channel.

description: A dreadful menace threatens the Mushroom kingdom. An unknown enemy has come between the mushroom folk and once peaceful neighbors have begun to fight one another. Lead an army of mushroom warriors and mediate peace in the forest! Mushroom Wars is a dynamic real-time strategy. Defeat enemy tribes or capture key strategic locations! Increase the size of your army, complete the construction of your villages, improve your weapons, capture smith shops or hold defensive towers – it's up to you to choose your way to victory! Complete a fascinating Campaign or challenge online! => A campaign containing 32 maps with increasing difficulty levels => Simple controls and exciting gameplay => Many challenges for hardcore gamers => Varying mission types: capture, king of the hill etc. => Three variants of controls for more effective play => Supports left-handed gamers
release_text: What's new in v.1.14: • Take part in the Space Tournament and receive treasure chests with valuable awards! • Play now to get awesome awards in Mushroom Wars 2! • Hided system buttons on Android 4.4. • Fixes on new maps. • Bug fixes Celebrate the update with Mushroom Wars!

description: Flickr Earth is an application which specializes on the "geotagged" photos of Flickr users. You are NOT required to login to your Flickr account to use this application. All of the current features are available to public users. Some of the current features: - Browse through photos taken near your current location - Explore photos taken anywhere in the world by navigating through the map or searching for a target location - Specify a geographical region (a country/continent) and search for a tag among the photos taken there - Find exactly what you are looking for by making advanced search queries on Flickr (specify tags, date range, interestingness, etc.) - View highly detailed information about any photo you stumble upon (e.g. tags, date taken, location on map, camera model, other photos by the same user) - Save photos in your device or share it with your friends through e-mail, instant messengers or social networking sites This is my first released application on Android and I would really appreciate if you can give me feedback with your ideas, comments or problems encountered while using Flickr Earth. And if you enjoyed using this application, don't forget to rate it. Thank you. Kind regards. Yunus Evren
release_text: GPS tracker was not turning off when application is closed - Fixed Further randomization of the photos that appear on map Minor changes in the user interface

description: A smart solution to facilitate the Police for reporting of crime from the location of occurrence to get a holistic and real time perspective of Crime reported for better countering measures and performance analysis.

The Toronto Crime Stoppers Mobile App was developed with one goal in mind; a safer Toronto for you! Download this FREE application and you’ll be on the leading edge of citizen crime prevention. Not only will you be promoting a safer community for your family and friends but you may be entitled to receive up to $2000.00 for your tip submissions! Crime Stoppers Toronto wanted to bring you a more convenient tool for tip submissions; past methods included calling into the hotline, “text message” response and filling out a long online form. With this new technology the user has the ability to: • Record a video or photograph for easy tip submission. • Find the nearest police station using GPS and receive turn by turn directions. • Check the status of submitted tips. • View Toronto’s “Most Wanted”. • One touch calling directly to a Crime Stoppers Representative. • One touch email composition to submit an email tip. • View Toronto’s “Crime of the Week”. • Connect with Toronto Crime Stoppers Social Media Pages. Toronto Crime Stoppers collects none of your personal information. Your tips are 100% anonymous, your identity is protected by the Supreme Court of Canada. You are provided with a unique user name and password and the app collect your “Push Message” ID so you can receive real time alerts about your submitted tips. We don’t collect any of your contact information! If you like our App and would like to see your city develop something similar, contact your local Crime Stoppers Program and let them know about us! Although crime is reported daily, there is a large number of unreported incidents every day. The leading contributor for that is fear, now with the Toronto Crime Stoppers Mobile App you can put those fears aside. Think prevention, think Crime Stoppers. It’s time to take back your communities! You Stay Anonymous, Criminals Don’t!

Chicken Drop is a fun filled, addictive & challenging game. There is no time limit, just awesome puzzles and hours of entertainment. Enjoy 80 tricky levels over 5 worlds (stages). !! Mission Of The Game!! Your mission is to help the chicken get to each nest while eating all the honey bees along the way. Drag the given tools i place and then click the switch & watch chicken bounce, chicken slide & chicken float around the levels. Use air balloons, elastic bands, and wooden blocks to make a perfect Mechanism and get all the honey bees. Think before you drop the chicken & be sure to avoid the bombs & other obstacles. !! How To Play!! 1- Drag the tools in place, set them up so the chicken will eat all the bugs (honey bees) then get to the nest. 2- Click the switch to drop the chicken. 3- The chicken will drop and bounce, float & move around the level while collecting honey bees along the way. 4- Finish the levels by getting to the nest. See how you go then move the tools again if he doesn't make it to the nest first time. !! Features!! * Chicken Drop is having 5 addictive stages (Chicken Coop, Farm House, and Old Barn), (Wind Mill-coming soon & Factory-coming soon). * Each stage is having 16 mind building levels. * Very addictive and mind building game play. * Great for all ages (kids, adults, and children). * Easy to learn but hard to master. * Music on/off function. * Sound on/off function. * Reset levels function.

3D-Fruit World!! Slice fruit by your finger, and enjoy fruit juice! Face the battle like Ninja Warrior, save yourself from knives while slicing the new variety of 3D fruits like (banana, cherry, pine-apple, water melon, pear, orange,). This new 3D Fruit Smasher game named as "3D-Fruit World" will change the trend of smashing the fruits. You need a top smashing speed to master the game in any of two modes (Classic Mode, Time Mode). How to Play:- * There are two modes "3D-Fruit World" game (Classic Mode, Time Mode). * In Classic Mode you have to save three given lives. You will be losing one life every time as you touch the knife. You have to smash the 3d Fruits but be careful from the Sharp Knife. * In Time Mode you have to tap the yellow clock also with 3D Fruits as you will get the extra seconds to improve score but if you slice the red clock your seconds will be deducted. Along the time management skills the fast smashing of fruits are necessary to score high. You have to smash very quickly if fruit fall down the screen you lose a life. # Share the link of the game via- Google+, facebook, twitter, whatsap and many more

description: Flute Fingering Chart is an easy to use reference application, that shows all the common fingering & trill combinations available on the flute. With over 400 different combinations for flute, piccolo, soprano, alto, and bass flutes, from B3 to F#7, this is the most comprehensive guide available for Android OS. This application has been designed with simplicity in mind, and it's intuitive interface is based on user feedback. Simply scroll left or right along the stave to the note you wish to look up and tap to select. Tap the note again, or use the back button to return to the stave. For fingerings with additional information, tap the "i" button to show more info. Press the Play Note button to hear the note being played on a real Flute.
release_text: - Added full support for 7" & 10" tablet devices - Added Play Note feature. Now hear the note being played on a real Flute.

description: Jigsaw Puzzle is a beautiful recreation of real jigsaw puzzles. Every puzzle is cut differently, so no two are the same. You can choose from 4 to 400 pieces on tablets or up to 100 pieces on phones. Move loose pieces to the margins and zoom in and out to focus on one area. Assemble pieces into groups, then move and connect the groups. Jigsaw Puzzle saves your works in progress so you can return and work on them any time. Solving puzzles is relaxing, rewarding, and keeps your brain sharp. If you want a greater challenge, turn on Piece Rotation. For the truly ambitious, there are also Tournament and Patterns packs. More than 4,000 jigsaw puzzles are available for download including lots of free packs, and new puzzles are added weekly. You can even make puzzles from your photos. There are more than 40 achievements to be earned and you can share completed puzzles with friends and family on Facebook. Download Jigsaw Puzzle today and see you've been missing. description: "Hitting Ball2" is a kind of "Breakout" game which is bouncing a ball and destroying bricks. A ball travels across the screen, bouncing off the top and side blocks. When a block is hit, the ball bounces away and the block is destroyed. The player loses a turn when the ball touches the bottom of the screen. To prevent this from happening, the player has a movable paddle to bounce the ball upward, keeping it in play. There are some items which take advantage to the game. -add extra ball -make the ball penetrated the block -make paddle larger -make paddle smaller -make the barrier to the bottom of the screen -make the ball speed up -make the ball speed down -make the ball bliked
release_text: A bug that the paddle does not move to right in the low-resolution devices was fixed.

High quality videos(50), audio/written instructions, clinical evidence summaries with PUBMed links. Developer website for details. -Physical Therapy / Physiotherapy -Manual Therapy -Chiropractor -Osteopathic MOBILE OMT for the SPINE is a powerful clinical reference and teaching tool for any student, clinician or educator involved in the practice or the teaching of manipulative/manual therapy for musculoskeletal disorders. A comprehensive mobile companion providing manipulative techniques for the cervical, thoracic, and lumbar spine presented in the context of best current evidence for use in treating spine disorders. Step by step written instructions, high-quality video demonstration with audio, indications for use, and evidence to support each technique. Summaries of the most recent clinical research involving manipulative therapy are provided for each spine region (cervical, lumbar, and thoracic) with links to PUBmed abstracts of relevant clinical studies. Additionally a brief summary of the history of manipulative therapy is presented, as well as definitions of terminology. OMT Spine Features: •Instructions for 50 orthopaedic manipulative techniques for the spine •High-quality video demonstration for each technique •Each video includes two angles of the technique being performed. Therefore, there’s no guessing the important or even subtle details of the techniques performance (pause, rewind, forward within the video) •Each video includes corresponding audio instructions that describe the technique as it’s being performed •Each technique includes common diagnoses or “indications” for which the technique is typically performed •Techniques include high-velocity thrust joint manipulations, non-thrust joint mobilizations, muscle stretching and “contract-relax” stretching techniques •Summaries of the current state of the research on OMT for regions of the spine (cervical, thoracic, and lumbar) •Links to PUBmed abstracts of research on OMT for spine disorders (internet connection required) •Easily email PUBmed abstracts of the pertinent studies to yourself or colleagues from within the app •Historical overview of manipulative therapy If you treat patients that have musculoskeletal disorders with manual therapy management strategies, then this app is the perfect companion for you and your practice! TARGET: -Osteopathic physicians -Physical Therapists / Physiotherapists -Chiropractors -Clinicians managing patients with musculoskeletal conditions -Medical students, interns, residents, fellows in any of these disciplines -Educators/Academicians in any of these disciplines -Anyone interested in manipulative/manual therapy Complete the series with the MOBILE OMT – LOWER EXTREMITY and MOBILE – OMT UPPER EXTREMITY apps! * Note: Need internet connection to access PUBMed links from within the app. Additionally, as mentioned earlier, the size of the app is significant due to the large number and quality of videos embedded native in this app. Note: *Required 1-time download of videos after purchase *Final app size = 160MB *If OS 2.2 or higher can save to SD card
release_text: Complete makeover for the app, with new User Interface. App now looks and works just like the latest iOS update. - Optimized videos - Improved navigation - Many bug fixes Also, added the ability to push updates (new techniques, videos, and other new content) directly to device, which helps keep it up to date with the latest content!

This is no ordinary to-do list app. Ultimate To-Do List gives you unique tools to help you organize, simplify, and get things done. Try it free for 2 weeks, then purchase unlimited use for $5 (US). Simple, but powerful. Whether you need a basic to-do list, need to manage complex projects, or fall somewhere in-between, the app can be set up to meet your exact needs. Turn on the features you need. Turn off those you don't. Organize your to-do list any way you like. You - not the app - decide what's most important. Use a task management system such as Getting Things Done (GTD) or Master Your Now (MYN), or set up your own system. Stop forgetting things. Highly customizable lists and reminders ensure you won't miss anything important. If you want, the app can even nag you repeatedly until you get the task done. Reminders can be based on time or location. Record and review your tasks hands-free . Use the app's voice mode to create, update, and read tasks while you're in the car, wearing gloves, or changing a diaper. Keep track of important information that is not a to-do item. The app's notes area lets you record reference information that you know you will need later on. Make the most of your large-screen device. Several split-screen options are available to handle larger smartphones, 12 inch tablets, and all sizes in-between. Stay in Sync. Link the app to a Google or Toodledo.com account and your devices will be perfectly in sync. Sync can occur automatically. Works with Android Wear. An Android Wear add-on is available that allows you to browse and check-off tasks, snooze reminders, and create and update tasks by voice. (Note that this add-on is currently available in English only.) Organize your tasks in numerous ways. Folders, subtasks, 5 priority levels, and status tracking are all available to help you stay organized. Contexts and Locations allow you to focus only on the tasks you can do right now. For example, while you’re at work you will only see work tasks. When you get home later in the day, only the home tasks appear. Sharing and Collaboration features allow you to assign tasks to others and track status. Use Toodledo’s collaboration features or use the app’s ability to link to multiple accounts. Advanced repeating patterns make it easy to set up tasks that are performed daily, weekly, monthly, or with more complex patterns. Time tracking allows you to track both the estimated and actual length of your tasks. A built-in timer is included. Advanced filter, sort, and display options allow you to filter your tasks on any field, sort by up to 3 levels, and adjust the display to show exactly what you want. Saved searches and custom views make it easy to keep track of multiple lists - each with its own filter, sort, and display settings. Calendar integration allows you to view your tasks on your device’s calendar, allowing you to see both calendar events and to-do items on one screen. Contacts integration gives you to the ability to link your tasks to a contact. This is great when a to-do item involves calling, emailing, or meeting with someone.
release_text: PLEASE READ BEFORE UPGRADING: This version uses the latest version of Toodledo's interface, which includes security improvements. If you sync with Toodledo, you will be asked to re-enter your Toodledo login information after upgrading. Other Updates: - The Android Wear add-on may now be installed by non-English users. Voice commands must still be in English. - Resolved an issue in which the free trial would expire early in rare circumstances. - Other bug fixes. See www.todolist.co for a list

Montreal Metro & Bus shows you the schedules of the bus and metro lines in Montreal. The schedules and routes are kindly provided by the STM through their Open Data initiative. This app was created in collaboration with RFx Software Inc.

Do you repeat this process multiple times a day? Do yourself a favor and install Webmail for Outlook today, the best unofficial Office Outlook Web Access front-end client out there! Features: - One touch log-in.. Tap the icon to check for new mail! - Full HTML message view w/in-line image support - just as you'd see it if you accessed it via the web. - Notifications when new email arrives - Download e-mail attachments right from the app. - Compose new emails. - Accept + Deny meeting requests. - View Calendar events for the day, or upcoming days - Access frequent contacts for your Outlook account or use your device's address book to select recipients. - Reply/Reply All/Forward - Folder switching, see folder unread message count - Turn your Out of Office auto-responder on or off and change the message, all from within the app. - Spell-check/ suggestions/ voice dictation, all supported! - More features coming soon based on user interest and demand! "Most" corporate Exchange 2007, 2010, & 2013 installations are supported! In addition, Office 365 accounts hosted at "outlook.office365.com" (including those that use ADFS authentication), and most Microsoft Forefront TMG (Threat Management Gateway) installations should also be supported. Please note, if your Exchange administrator has modified the interface, a non-TMG ISA server or other UAG is installed, or you require extra information (like an extra security code besides a password) to log into your e-mail account, it may or may not be compatible with this app. Please contact me if you have problems and I will do my best to investigate the issue. Money back guarantee! If your OWA does not work, please contact me for a full refund. *Webmail for Outlook was not created nor endorsed by Microsoft Corporation.*

description: If you're like me, keeping your mobile devices up-to-date with your latest music purchases is a hassle. I've always wished it was a simple as pressing a button -- and now it is. Sync for iTunes allows you to copy your iTunes collection from your Windows PC to your Android device with the press of a button, no wires, no hassle. Download a new song on your computer? No problem, just open Sync for iTunes on your mobile device and press 'Sync', and that track will be copied onto your device wirelessly in seconds. Download all of your music, or use features that allow you greater control over what music gets copied to your device. Sync for iTunes has been the most popular app for wirelessly syncing music on BlackBerry devices since late 2011 ranking as high as #3 on BlackBerry App World. This well-loved app is now available for Android. NOTE: - KitKat (Android 4.4) now prevents apps from writing to your SD card in the default Music location. I'm currently investigating solutions. - Download link for accompanying Windows PC program: http://www.danielbigham.ca/sync - Works great on Android phones and tablets. - Sync for iTunes does not copy music from your Android device to your computer. - Mac is not yet supported. - This is a new app: If you run into any issues please give me a shout at daniel.bigham@gmail.com , and I would be happy to help.
release_text: - Fixed NullPointerException seen by some users on initialization.

description: See how many levels you can get through in this game. Instructions: Use the arrows to get the ball to the flag, but beware because the buttons move. As you progress through the levels the arrows will move faster, and the game will become more difficult.

Night Moto Racing is now available on Google Play Store for your android devices! With over 1,000,000 downloads and 250,000 active users, see what the fuss is about in this adrenaline pumping racing game. Motorcycle Racing Game Features * Dozens of physics based controls and stunts. * Drag your bike through awesome challenges and amazing missions. * Stunning graphics and game play. * Shoot your opponents with the built in missile technology inside your moto bikes. * XP points system to level up * Engaging music * After reaching xp level 20, you will unlock whole new world of locations! If you think bikes racing games are always easy - think again! Are you ready for a challenging race to the finish in the best racing game of the year? Warning: The stunts performed in this game could be dangerous if done in real life. Please do not attempt.

description: Why just play blackjack when you could also learn how to win at blackjack? description: One of the best games of 2014, complete with epic tactical battles and full 3D graphics, is now available for FREE and on Android! THE FIRST 3D STRATEGY GAME WITH PVP ELEMENTS! Age of Fury is a strategy game with PvP elements for players who yearn for epic battles and martial glory. In Age of Fury you can become a mighty Lord, assemble a powerful squadron of brave warriors, and set off to conquer neighboring lands. FEATURES • High-quality graphics and intuitive controls • Fascinating quests in Campaign mode • Join forces with your friends to form a clan and play in PvP mode • Build an impenetrable city with a flexible defense system • A simple, easy-to-learn battle system with deep tactical possibilities • Achievements you can be proud of • A one-of-a-kind gaming experience with lots of surprises • New friends! PLAY WITH YOUR FRIENDS FOR FREE Do your friends share your ambitions? Join forces! Found a mighty clan with your friends! If military tactics aren't really your thing, you can join an existing clan and set off for battle right away. UNIQUE GAMEPLAY AND AN EPIC STORYLINE The war between the inhabitants of the Reborn Lands and the vicious spawn of the World's Edge lasted for thirty years. In the face of a common threat, three races – humans, elves, and dwarves – had no choice but to join forces. Thanks to the efforts of hundreds of valiant warriors their alliance finally defeated the forces of evil. But the joy and happiness born of their great victory did not last long. Old quarrels and feuds that had been forgotten during the war erupted anew. And so began the blood-soaked period known in the chronicles as the Age of Fury. Official Facebook community: http://www.facebook.com/Age.of.Fury.3D

Each geocacher has their preferences when it comes to the different types of caches. Some like climbing caches, others prefer geocaching at night or with the family, and still others simply like "quick points" on a trail. AMAZE shows you geocaches exactly according to these criteria . Independend of whether this is a Traditional, Multi, Mystery, or one of the other Geocaching -Types . Search right around you or just look for a place, an area or a prominent point in the search box, and AMAZE finds the best Geocaches for you. Create GPX files with just one click, and use them in a "Geocaching search program" of your choice. Then, when you have found your favorite cache, you can log it in AMAZE, categorize it, and ... DETAILED RATE IT !   CAUTION: This app works with the Geocaching Live API, and - due to the large Inforequests - currently of sense ONLY FOR PREMIUM MEMBERS of Geocaching .com! WE WISH YOU A LOT OF FUN WITH THIS APP AND MUCH SUCCESS AT GEOCACHING. Features: • Lists geocaches according to predefined categories • Search for caches in the area next to you (The 100 best in 5Km / 3.1 Miles) • Search field input for places, areas and POIs • Output of the results in more detail list • Display of results on Google Maps or Offline-Maps • Categorize own caches (Radius 100Km / 62 Miles) • Wish list for special caches • Creating / exporting a GPX file (consisting of the personal cache selection) • NEW DETAILED RATING SYSTEM • Display and integration of favorites points and GC -Vote reviews • Create a log entry directly from the app • Categorization of the caches • Comfortable feedback system • List of your missing reviews • List the generated GPX files ( with content preview) • Search for geocaches by entering GC-Code or GC-Name • Go Caching directly with an external App from the detail view. • NO advertising.

description: French <> English Dictionary ( Both French to English and English to French ) 100 % offline and free . You can search both English and French words. You can search words directly from “Internet Browser” or other Applications by Sharing option. In sharing option you will find “French Dictionary” and choosing “French Dictionary” will open the dictionary with the shared word so you need not type and exiting from dictionary will return you to “Internet Browser” or other Applications again. This is not only a Dictionary but also a learning tool. You can use this dictionary when you have no internet connection. MCQ (Multiple Choice Question) option available. There is auto suggestion so you need not type full words. You also can use Speech to text feature . You can add words to study plan. And also you can remove words from study plan. You can turn on/off auto search going to setting of the app. So low profile Mobile handset can turn off Auto search to type quickly. You will see Dictionary icon on notification bar to start app quickly. On sharing text you will find French Dictionary. This will be helpful to find out meaning of any word. • No internet connection required • French To English • English To French • Search From Web • Search by Sharing • Auto Suggestion • Pronounce & Voice Search • Antonyms (Opposite words) • Synonyms • Backup and Restore • History & Study Plan • Word Game • Share Words • Copy Words
release_text: • Voice search bug fixed • Word of the day added (Up to 5 words in a day) • Antonyms added • You can remove Banner Ad to get full screen for content by choosing Ad type.

USA TODAY named Calculator Plus among its "25 Essential Apps", calling it the "handy calculator app that's garnered great user ratings" I'm Calculator Plus - the perfect calculator for Android. I'm easy to use and beautifully designed to do things better than your phone or handheld calculator ever did. I love saving you time and effort. I remember everything you calculate, and let you review it anytime, making me perfect for shopping, doing homework, balancing checkbooks, or even calculating taxes. And if you quit the calculator and go do something else, it's all still here when you come back. You'll never need to type the same calculation twice again. I'm attractive and effective and I make great use of your big, beautiful display: - You'll never forget where you are in a calculation - I show you exactly what's happening at all times - I remember everything, so you can take a break, then come back later and pick up where you left off - I show your calculations in clear, elegant type that's easy to read, with commas just where they should be - You can use backspace anytime to correct a simple mistake, instead of starting over - Use memory to keep a running total you can actually see - My percentage key shows exactly what it did, so you're not left confused - Swipe memory keys aside for advanced math functions! - NEW! Full support for Samsung Multi-Window - true multitasking for your Galaxy device. - My intuitive, lovable design makes it simple to do everyday calculations on your phone or tablet Let Calculator Plus and your phone or tablet finally put that handheld calculator to rest! This is an ad supported version - our ad-free version is also available. Calculator Plus (C) 2015 Digitalchemy, LLC

description: Take a thrilling ride through the city that never sleeps with 3D Rollercoaster Rush NY! With the revolutionary AllJoyn© innovation, you can now play your favorite Rollercoaster competing against your friends! Play 40 action-packed New York City 3D rollercoaster tracks full of steep, sky-scraping peaks, huge drops and gut-wrenching curves! Pull off Extreme Air, Crushing G’s and other insane stunts as you overcome challenging breakable tracks, loop-the-loops, chasm jumps and more! Experience 40 ALL NEW Career tracks + 40 ALL NEW Challenge races with over 100 crazy loop-the-loops, jumps and tunnels in a stunning New York City setting! New, unlimited ways to crash your cart – including terrifying breakable tracks! Face friends head-to-head in real time with AllJoyn multiplayer mode! Career Mode – Keep your carts intact through huge loop the loops, chasm jumps and more! Challenge Races – race for the best time without flying off the tracks! Score big with insane stunts like – Extreme Air, Crushing G’s and more! description: ★Launcher Planet, the winner of Reddot Design Award 2014★ Have fun decorating your smartphone in your own style with more than 110,000 awesome free wallpapers and 600+ themes. ★ Personalize your home screen with Launcher Planet ★ ✔ 110,000+ Free wallpapers! - Select ‘Wallpaper’ menu in ‘Theme Shop’ and download free wallpaper you like. ✔ DIY (Do It Yourself) Theme Settings - Go ‘Theme settings’ and select ‘Theme DIY’ menu. - Anyone can make a fully customizable launcher with this setting. Welcome to a magical world where coloring pictures brings them to life! Lots of fun combined with learning - could there be anything better for your child? When creating JOYPA COLORS we concentrated on designing a highly intuitive interface - tailored to our youngest audience. Being parents helped - observing our children's needs led us to create a game that is simple yet surprising and delightful! This is the first and so far the only fully interactive coloring book on the mobile market. Our aim was to allow small children (2-6 yrs) to be able to control the game independently, enjoy it even without adult supervision. That is why we created our character - a charming panda - to help children perform simple tasks throughout the game. We introduced parental control - a timer that will turn off the application after a chosen period of time, and the magic wand tool - that randomly changes colors after every tap ensuring even a two year old can color by them self! Simple tasks and rewards, pleasant sounds, naming colors and animals - even parents will be able to sit down and relax with Joypa Colors, where time has no meaning, all that counts is fun. We also know how frustrating hidden payments and adds can be, especially in applications dedicated to children - that is why there are none in Joypa colors - you get a fully functional game with stunning graphics and attention to detail - as simple as that. Features: - a child-friendly intuitive interface (tested and refined thanks to a group of several dozen toddlers) - 16 fully interactive, uniquely designed coloring pages - a helpful character that shows your child how to use the application independently - 22 unlock-able stamps that can be used to decorate the coloring pages - a camera tool that records your child's picture to your device’s gallery - parental control and an innovative magic wand tool for younger children - pleasant animal and nature sounds your child will happily recognize - simple tasks to perform (eg, feeding a horse, watering plants, etc.) - an additional mini-game - Balloon pop! - no ads, or any additional payments (no in-app purchases) - best experience on iPad but also fully functional and enjoyable on iPhone! Check out our special pre-Christmas promotion - 50 % off! It's a coloring book, it's lovely and fully interactive. Your kids will love it!
release_text: Android 4.4 KitKat crash / empty colors list issue FIXED!

description: Step aboard the 1914 Orient Express in this award-winning mystery adventure from Prince of Persia creator Jordan Mechner, now for the first time on Android! JULY, 1914. With Europe on the brink of war, the luxurious Orient Express departs Paris for Constantinople, plunging American doctor Robert Cath into a maelstrom of treachery, romance, and international intrigue. The Last Express is a complete, faithful Android version of the internationally-acclaimed 1997 PC classic. GAME FEATURES: - 20+ hours of game play - Interact with 30+ characters who behave like actual people on a train -- moving about in real-time and conversing in their native languages - Eavesdrop on conversations, sneak into compartments, and uncover clues - Explore a richly detailed, historically accurate 3D recreation of the 1914 Orient Express - Your actions affect other characters’ behavior, making every play-through different - Rewind feature allows you to back up to any point in the story and choose a different course of action - Playable in 5 languages: English, French, German, Italian and Spanish ADDITIONAL FEATURES ON ANDROID: - Unlock challenging achievements that test your sleuthing skills - Dynamic, 3-tiered hint system created specifically for mobile - 20 unlockable character biographies - Unlock cinematics to replay at any time **************** "The Last Express is just one of those games that adventure fans, or just fans of a good story, need to play." 4/4 - Slide To Play "A shining example of how deeply gameplay and storytelling can be intertwined" 5/5 - AppSpy "It's a piece of videogame history and a shining example of what can be done to create an experience so much more immersive than the Heavy Rains of today." - 8/10, Destructoid **************** “Exquisite design and a literary story. A thrilling ride.” – Newsweek “The top adventure game… thumbs up by all ages and both genders.” – Family PC “A masterpiece.” – Computer Games Strategy Plus “Gripping… amazing… totally unique. The best adventure game I have ever played. Beautiful, skillfully crafted, and worth every penny and hour of your time.” – Games Domain Review FOR MORE ABOUT THE LAST EXPRESS, VISIT: http://www.facebook.com/lastexpress facebook.com/dotemu twitter.com/dotemu youtube.com/dotemu http://jordanmechner.com/ /*** Please make sure you have 1.5GB of free space on your device before buying ***\
release_text: Update on 1.0.5 -> Fix a crash when reading passenger list -> Security improvement => Updating the game will NOT require to re-download all data (only 30Mb) and will NOT affect your saves. /*** Please make sure you have 1.5GB of free space on your device before buying ***\ We hope you love the game, and if so, please tell your friends !! The DotEmu team.
