description: UCCW or a custom launcher. Every step is here. Nova Launcher Prime setup: Press menu on your phone Press Nova settings >desktop>desktop grid. Set rows to 10 and columns to 8. back out.. >Width margin. Set to none. back out.. >Height margin. Set to none. back out.. Make sure "show shadows" is unchecked > "home screens" and remove all but one screen. back out.. >"scroll effect" set to none. back out.. >Wallpaper scrolling. Set to off. back out.. Uncheck "infinate scroll". Scroll to the bottom and open the "advanced" tab and check "resize all widgets". Back out to main menu >Dock. Uncheck "enable dock". back out.. >Look and feel. Uncheck "show notification bar". back out.. >Gestures and buttons. >Swipe up. Click "app drawer". >Gestures and buttons. >Swipe down. Click "expand notifications". Done. UCCW setup: After you download the theme... Clear your homescreen of any icons or widgets Long press your homescreen Select "widgets" Click on UCCW Click the 4x2 widget Find and click the first widget of this theme Touch the white hand After the widget appears, long press it Click "resize" and resize it so it spans the width of your screen. Repeat this process for the rest of the widgets. Once all the widgets are placed on the screen, rearrange them like the pictures. Done. Changing colors and hotspots: Open your app drawer Find and click UCCW Press your phone menu key Click "Lock widgets (Hotspot mode)". Click "off". Go to your home page Click one of the widgets Here you can change any color you want If you mess anything up beyond simple repair just delete the widget and add it again. *Don't add the new widget through the UCCW editor as the widgets will not show up in the list. You must make a whole new widget by long pressing your home screen.* To change the hotspots... scroll to the bottom of the UCCW editor Click a hotspot and choose what you'd like to change it to. Once you're done editing... go back into your app drawer >UCCW >phone menu >Lock widgets (hotspot folders) >press "on". Enjoy your awesome screen! FAQ: How to change temperature units? Open the UCCW app in your app drawer >menu> check Celsius. Why does the skin not show up in the list? This is a Google related issue with some Jellybean devices. If you have this issue, email me. Ill send you a fix.

Keno is a popular lottery type game where you choose between 3 and 10 numbers from the 80 displayed on the main grid. The computer then chooses 20 random numbers and if they match any of your numbers then you win the points shown in the "Payout" box. By default the amount of points you can bet or stake for each go is 1 unit but you can alter that to any amount up to 10. Instructions on how to play the game are shown onscreen. Can be played landscape on a cell phone but best played on a tablet.

Nine Launcher(Grid 9Launcher) Pro de-clutters android desktops and transforms them into simple, elegant & beautiful masterpieces. Never seen before, Nine Launcher Pro will change the way you see your phone forever. Notice: Widgets and folders are NOT supported. Have you ever been overwhelmed by the amount of clutter all your apps can create? Nine Launcher Pro de-clutters desktops by displaying nine apps per page, simpler to use, and more aesthetically pleasing. Nine apps per page is the ideal number to blend functionality with clarity -- as we know, the number of apps which people usually used are less than ten. In addition, users can further transform their desktop by downloading an array of stunning Nine Launcher Pro themes that feature creative, bright and unique icon border variations and shelves. New themes are constantly being added, and most are available at no cost, you can search " NineLauncher " in the Google Play Store to find the right one for you. More features than the free version: 1. Create unlimited number of pages on the desktop. 2. Support more special fantastic themes.
release_text: 1. Changed the themes list to 3x3, more easy to use. 2. description: The GDFL app is a collaboration between Gridiron Pro and Sport Ngin. The site is a true destination for all schedules, scores, news, photos and more. Now you can access photos, videos, comments, stats and live scores on your Android device. - Follow your favorite http://www.gdfl.org team within the app. - Keep up with the latest schedules, results, news and statistics. - Share photos and videos right from the game! - Enjoy rosters and player profiles, complete with game-by-game statistics. - Comment on events, articles, photos and videos. - Receive push notifications for game/event updates, news articles, videos and posts.

It's the GREATEST FLAG QUIZ ever made!!! Do you know all the flags in the world? Test yourself in this fun and exciting quiz! It's not only entertaining but also a way to get familiar with the world flags! You have 60 seconds to guess as many flags as possible, and for every 5 correct answers you get additional 5 seconds! Wrong answers will cost you 5 seconds. Are you up for the challenge? Good luck and have fun!

Welcome to the exciting game where peaceful balloons fight against the bloodthirsty zombies who want to capture their world! Insidious zombies lurk under the barricade, and at night to attack and destroy balls. If you're on the good side, you have to help the balloons to defend their world. Destroy the building, behind which lurk the zombies and kill them! Save the world of balloons! Good luck! Funny and dynamic game with the elements of the physical puzzle is played in the same breath: blasting the balls and throwing the various items on the constructions where lurking zombies. The goal of the game - with use balloons and items that are linked to them, to destroy the building and defeat the zombies. 160 challenging levels await you! Get real prizes for playing the game! Collect mPOINTS for daily actions on the game! Choose your rewards! Redeem your mPOINTS for gift cards from major retailers. 200 mPOINTS during one session is easy!

description: Grouptic is a group address book(group member contacts) service which offers its users a smart, collaborative way of managing group address books. Group admins can be free from the hassles of collecting and updating member contact information. Admins also have the option of making quick group announcements to the group notice board where members can conveniently view the announcements and make comments on the go. Grouptic allows all group members can quickly access the member contact list whenever they need it from their computer or mobile device. Furthermore, each user can update their contact information in as many groups as they belong to all at once. 1. Admin features - upload excel file based group addressbook / access via mobile app - add/edit custom information items to share among members - add/edit non-user/offline member contact info - control invitation - control admin members - *free, quick announcements to members through the notice board 2. Common features - call/SMS/email with one-click in a contact list - send group SMS/email from smartphone - propagate my updates to all the groups I belong to - *comment on announcements on the notice board and view announcement history

description: ✐ Coloring: Houses is a game designed for kids to learn to paint properly, develop imagination, concentration, ingenuity and creativity. A coloring game it will become a very useful tool to achieve paint pictures using the right colors and without leaving the outline of the image. Coloring: Houses is the best application to find among all the free games available! ✏ ✏ ✏ ✏ ✏ ✏ ✏ ✏ ✏ ✏ ✏ ✏ ✏ ✏ ✏ ✏ ✏ ✏ ✏ ✏ ✐ Houses Coloring Game Features: - Create a drawing - Block painting technique using paint bucket or by hand with a brush - Print - Delete and Undo - Save Drawing on your mobile device - Game is available in all major languages: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese ...

description: My Note Pad is an intuitive notepad application that allows you to capture and organize your thoughts on-the-go. The main notepad screen gives you a note pad look-and-feel, allowing you to view selected categories, or sort the notes by title, date created or date last modified. Key Features: - Allows you to categorize notes when entered. - Provides filtering capabilities to display notes from a selected category. - Has the ability to order notes by title, date created or date last modified. - Has the ability to convert spoken notes into text for easy retrieval. - Search your note pad by either typing, or speaking to your device. - Share notes at the touch of a button using your favourite electronic method (e-mail, twitter, facebook,..etc)installed on your device. This can be your new personal assistant.
release_text: - Minor bug fixes - Added auto-correct and predictive typing - New performance improvements for large note lists.

description: Media Streamer is an application designed for wireless portable drive. Media Streamer provides wireless storage and data sharing function as a wireless data server for smart phone. Media Streamer allows users store and share any data via Wi-Fi connection. Smart Box supports up to 6 connections simultaneously to share multimedia including photos, music, video, and documents cross device and platform. Features: 1. File browsing and sharing ￭ Photo Thumbnail (list and grid view), and slide show ￭ Music streaming ￭ Video streaming ￭ Document 2. Music playing supports: ￭ MP3 meta data ￭ Shuffle and repeat play ￭ background playback 3. File transfer (multi-files upload and download in a size limitation of 500MB per operation) 4. Delete file 5. Search function by key words 6. Various file listing mode based on file type, name, size, and modified time. 7. Auto detect and connect to Media Streamer 8. WiFi WPA encryption (SSID and password setting) 9. Reboot Media Streamer 10.Hardware reset: restore Media Streamer to factory setting

Catch Word - a classical game for all of age. Vivid image , nice effects , creative and exciting entertainment for you . Descriptions - Guess the word by looking at only a picture - Increased recognize language ability (special for kids or who are learning English) - Expand your vocabulary - Don't worry if you can not guess answer because you 'll get help suggest answers and help answer questions . - Use coins to reveal one of the correct letters or correct answer - Facebook share - Compare your point against friends. Your achievements will be updated daily. Features: - Over 200 challenge levels - Random images - amazing answers . - You must have a rich imagination - Played in Horizontal Screen. Support android 2.3 or higher Download now and let's liberate your imagination. Very interesting for you!

Together adventure into the world of sweet candy. Sweets adventure - a game play style similar to connect twins, but there are more creative and more attractive. Try right now. Features: - Earn points to unlock new round. - Collect enough butterflies and break stone to through the level - Collect special candies: more playing time, swapped candies, or automatically break the 3 pairs same. - The game has 2 game modes: classic and adventure with saga - Over 100 levels - Game horizontal support and the computer screen android 2.2 and above Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master , Ain't it the sweetest game ever ! - Crush your friend

This game measures your Intelligence Quotient (IQ), which will allow you to know the strength of your own mind. It evaluates your learning ability, memory, logical think ability and creativity. You will have to say : "What the hell?? " How to play - Multi sectors of knowledge, interesting questions and you need a few tricks to pass challenge questions. It really is a small scams - Unlimited time. if you answer wrong 3rd , your points will be deducted and return where you beginning - contain detailed explanation after every answer. Brief explanation for better understanding and reading - The new player has 5 points. 1 point deducted for wrong answers, 1 point plus for true answers. 2 points plus for Correct answer of question 10,20,30 ... Unique features: - you can share good answers on the FB wall. Let's make a good record collection. - You can also practice English vocabulary from this app.. - Simple user interface, unique characters - This app will be constantly updated with new contents, and tests which help you continually refreshing your knowledge. Challenge yourself! Challenge your friends! Each of our challenging levels tests your mind in a different way. So why don't let your IQ freedom!

One Touch Drawing Master is a simple and very addictive brain puzzle game. You have to draw all lines without repeat. There are special mode which is named as "Master mode". In Master mode to challenge your best record. Three mistakes, game over. More wonderful levels will be added, thanks. Features: - Line that must be passed twice. - One directional line. - Multiple Warp dot. - Multiple Direction trigger. - Multiple Path trigger. - Custom Level Editor. - Supports every resolution. - Share your solution on Facebook, Kakao Story and MMS. - Optional vibration when you get to the dot. - Supports Full HD devices. - The store page for puchasing items. (i.e. stars, ads remover, level editor) - Supports Global Ranking. - Save and restore game data to the cloud
